content: That's a great plan! I think I'll start by creating a content calendar for my Reel series on self-care and mindfulness. I'll plan out each Reel, including the topic, script, and visuals, to ensure consistency and cohesion throughout the series. I'll also make sure to use a mix of formats, such as tutorials, Q&A sessions, personal stories, and tips, to keep my content fresh and engaging. Additionally, I'll use relevant hashtags and tag other accounts in my niche to increase the visibility of my posts and attract new followers.
